fields.name: status
fields.description: An optional status attribute with a value of deleted indicates the withdrawal of availability of the specified metadata format for the item, dependent on the repository support for deletions.

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: The unique identifier of an item in a repository

fields.name: datestamp
fields.description: The date of creation, modification or deletion of the record for the purpose of selective harvesting.

fields.name: setSpec
fields.description: The set membership of the item for the purpose of selective harvesting.

name: header
description: Contains the unique identifier of the item and properties necessary for selective harvesting (OAI-PMH).

fields.name: language
fields.description: Language(s) of the book. A book may have multiple languages, written in different ways (i.e. Deutsch, German, de, Deutschland).

fields.name: date
fields.description: The year of publication of the book.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of content. Can be 'book' or 'chapter'.

name: metadata
description: A single manifestation of the metadata from an item (OAI-PMH).

fields.name: pages
fields.description: Number of pages of the book.

fields.name: added_on_date
fields.description: Date and time of book's record entry.

name: csv
description: Additional info from the csv file.
